resources.string: Tap anywhere to dismiss this pop up.
Nothing to modify as of yet.
We have using the Smoooth Icon Pack by Software Mansion S.A. for the iconography of our application.

Refrain from swiping away the application in the app switcher, as this action will result in the complete destruction of the application and the subsequent resetting of all data.

This application is solely intended for personal use within the confines of the store where I am employed. It does not establish any connections to external servers nor does it possess the capability to initiate communication with external servers.

All crew information stored within the mobile application is retained temporarily until the application is destroyed.

It is important to note that this application is a personal project and is not intended for commercial use.
